title: Туристическая полиция
overview: The employee of tourist police Lera wants to investigate a serious case and dangerous crimes. But in her Department, they occur as rare as a good mood of the head and intelligence from colleagues in the service. Despite this, Lera basically refuses to "warm place", carefully prepared by his father, Admiral, and does not give up work in the special unit for the protection of public order in Sochi. But how to continue to serve and protect the peace of the city, contact the thief and a crook?
